name: FPS Shooter King: Eliminate En
description:
FPS Shooter King: Eliminate Enemy is a very challenging FPS sniper action game! Take the best shot to kill and eliminate every escape crime in the car. Attack enemy hiding in dust and sniper assassin rebellions with a realistic gun leaving no exit for the fierce killer because you are an army commando shot to perform the real mission.
Features:
-Realistic 3D shooting battlefield environment
-Top-notch sound effects
- Radar vision positioning the enemy's position
- Immersive action filled missions
- Play anytime, anywhere
- Realistic combat mechanics
